items.content_html: This is a Node.js-based application built with JavaScript to provide fast, scalable, and efficient backend services. It utilizes an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model, making it lightweight and ideal for real-time applications.

items.content_html: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization‚Äîresizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.
